name: Wall Smashes Hit
description:
Welcome to wall smashes hit Hyper Casual game.

amazing Super Smash VFX You've Never Seen Before.

wall smashes hit is a tap/Swipe hyper casual game that will keep you hooked for hours!

Features:

* Fun and Entertaining.

* Colourful environment and Fog.

* 7 beautiful colorful themes.

* Amazing Save System.

* Notification System.

* Tap and Swipe Controller.

* Stress Buster.

* Relaxing Gameplay.

Try out the game and Have Fun...and Enjoy...!

Start playing wall smashes hit the game and blast your stress and get some refreshment..!
